#include <cmath>
#include<cstring>
#include <cstdio>
#include <vector>
#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;

int main() 
{
  int i,ar,sum,n;
  cin>>n;
  while(n--)
      {
      cin>>ar;
      sum=0;
      for(i=1;i<=ar/2;i++)
          {
          if(ar%i==0)
              {sum=sum+i;}
          }
      cout<<sum<<endl;
  }
return 0;
}
